about_the_game:
NOTE FROM DEVELOPERS: 

Hello! Please note that the current demo version of SEDAP! will only support local co-op. We are still in the midst of developing online multiplayer, which will be introduced in a future update to the demo. If you plan to play co-op across two computers, we recommend using Steam's in-built Remote Play Together feature.

Two aspiring culinary geniuses open a traveling food truck and venture out to Khaya Island – a long abandoned, dangerous island with no shortage of monsters and mysteries. Together, the duo explore Khaya Island in search of new recipes and tastes while slowly uncovering the veil of secrets that haunts the locale.

  • Forge your culinary adventure either solo, or with a friend!

  • Explore each level to obtain ingredients and prepare food orders, facing fearsome beasts and dangerous hazards along the way.

    • Whip up dishes as Som, the Cooker, or battle fearsome creatures while foraging for ingredients as Gon, the Hunter. It’ll take your combined effort to keep your business up and running!

    • Venture through a rich and unique Southeast Asian-inspired fantasy world, hone your culinary skills and unearth the mysteries of Khaya Island.

    • The island boasts a variety of vastly different biomes, each with their own food, cooking methods and unique wildlife for players to enjoy.

    • Prepare a wide range of popular dishes enjoyed in Southeast Asia, such as pineapple fried rice, chicken rice, banh mi and even bubble tea!

    • Fill up the Makanomicon, a legendary recipe book, as you discover and master cooking each dish! There’s a ton of dishes waiting to be served up in each level.

    • Equip yourself with Charms, Weapons and Utensils as you face the challenges that lie ahead in Khaya Island.

name: SEDAP! A Culinary Adventure Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i5-2300/AMD FX-4300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 560 (2GB)/AMD Radeon 7850 (2GB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: SEDAP! is a co-op cooking-combat adventure that combines the chaos of a collaborative kitchen and the wonders of adventuring into an unexplored world. Embark on an exciting culinary journey, whip up delectable delicacies, and serve your way through a fantastical reimagination of Southeast Asia!
supported_languages: English, Indonesian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Vietnamese, Malay, Traditional Chinese, Filipino
